author: cnbc.com
title: Holiday Inn Charlotte University Place Appoints New Director of Sales
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C., April 11, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Holiday Inn Charlotte University hotel, located just north of Center City and right on I-85, is pleased to announce Shanna Edmundson as its new Director of Sales, effective immediately.
The recently renovated Holiday Inn Charlotte University surpasses expectations with its southern charm and tremendous hospitality. The hotel itself is located in the heart of University City and offers the convenience of being just minutes away from trendy shops and restaurants. The hotel staff is devoted to making sure each guest will have a memorable and worry-free experience. Due to her impressive resume, the property is certain that Shanna will be a perfect addition to the team.
“Shanna has an extensive hospitality background with over 10 years of experience in the industry,” said Sean Baba, General Manager of the property. “We’re delighted someone with her passion is joining our team here at the Holiday Inn Charlotte University Place.”
Shanna began her career in hospitality after she graduated from The Ohio State University with a Bachelor’s Degree in Hospitality Management. During the course of her career, she worked with many established brands, including Marriott, Hyatt and Holiday Inn. Prior to joining the Holiday Inn Charlotte University team, Shanna held the title of Travel Sales Manager, Director of Catering, and Sales Manager at her previous places of employment.
Shanna's in-depth knowledge and professional experience ensures success to the property as well as exceptional guest services. In her free time, Shanna enjoys live music, sports, traveling and spending time with her family and friends. Shanna believes that the key to happiness is excitement for the future, and she is very excited to begin her journey with Holiday Inn Charlotte University.
To learn more about The Holiday Inn Charlotte University and new Director of Sales Shanna Edmundson, please contact her at 704-319-5190 or shanna.edmundson@hicharlotteup.com
About The Holiday Inn Charlotte University
The Holiday Inn Charlotte University is located just north of center-city Charlotte and features 174 guestrooms and 5,000 square feet of flexible meeting space. The hotel also offers a business center and complimentary wireless high speed Internet. Home to the Red Sky Lounge and Grill, an upscale and modern space with a cozy fireplace, the Holiday Inn Charlotte University features three distinct areas for guests’ dining pleasure, including a posh lounge and bar, the restaurant, and a private dining room for intimate events. Additional leisure amenities include a fitness center and outdoor pool. For information on the Holiday Inn Charlotte University, please visit www.HICharlotteU.com or call 704-547-0999.
Contact: Sean Baba Tel: 704-547-0999 Email: sean.baba@hicharlotteup.com
